document_data.name: Destroy Undead
document_data.mainbody: '''''Destroy undead''''' was a powerful version of the [[arcane magic]] [[wizard]] [[spell]] ''[[hold undead]]''.
document_data.Effects: This spell ''[[disintegrate]]d'' corporeal [[undead]] whose life force was weaker than that of the caster. This spell had no effect upon incorporeal undead such as [[ghost]]s or [[wraith]]s.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required as a [[material component]] a [[priest]]'s [[holy symbol]] to cast.
document_data.History: An even more powerful version of this spell was capable as a power through the use of the [[artifact]] called the ''[[Ankh of Life]]'' from the [[Old Empires]].
